title: DevOps Engineer (Remote)
description:
Posted by

Meriem MESSAOUDI

Technical Recruiter at Gemography

Send InMail

About Gemography

Join Gemography and work with top tech startups and engineering teams from New York, LA, San Francisco and Paris on large-scale applications and systems. It's long-term, remote and comes with an indefinite period employment contract.




You will work on

Support infrastructure for data science and machine learning workflows.
Building reliable processes using modern automation and orchestration tools.
Support, troubleshoot, monitor, and optimize production systems.
Build flexible systems choosing simple, straightforward solutions over more complex ones.
Write high-quality code that is robust and can be delivered and easily maintained.
Implement systems-level infrastructure improvements to drive a high degree of reliability, scalability, and security.
Work in an extremely fast-paced, collaborative environment with a focus on driving best practices.
Stay up to date with state-of-the-art tools, technologies, and techniques for automation, quality, and security as it applies to continuous integration and deployment practices.




What we are looking for

Strong expertise with Linux based operating systems.
Experience building high-quality distributed systems or backend service.
Experience with designing and administration networking and security in cloud environments.
Experience with configuration management and provisioning tools, managing infrastructure through code scripting.
You’re a fast learner, can contribute from day one as well as integrate and apply new concepts quickly.
You take pride in what you create and passionate about getting the details right, even when no one's looking.
You are able to weigh tradeoffs, articulate complex ideas, and have precision about what you know and don't know.
You enjoy staying on top of tech trends and hacking new things.




Benefits & Perks

Competitive salaries and performance bonuses.
Your own Spotify Premium and Netflix accounts.
24-days paid time-off (+ public holidays).
Health insurance & pension;




Important

Resume/cover letter are optional.
The job role is fully remote (anywhere in Egypt).
It's long term and comes with an indefinite period employment contract.




Employment Type

Full-time

Posted by

Meriem MESSAOUDI

Technical Recruiter at Gemography

Send InMail

About Gemography

Join Gemography and work with top tech startups and engineering teams from New York, LA, San Francisco and Paris on large-scale applications and systems. It's long-term, remote and comes with an indefinite period employment contract.


You will work on

  • Support infrastructure for data science and machine learning workflows.
  • Building reliable processes using modern automation and orchestration tools.
  • Support, troubleshoot, monitor, and optimize production systems.
  • Build flexible systems choosing simple, straightforward solutions over more complex ones.
  • Write high-quality code that is robust and can be delivered and easily maintained.
  • Implement systems-level infrastructure improvements to drive a high degree of reliability, scalability, and security.
  • Work in an extremely fast-paced, collaborative environment with a focus on driving best practices.
  • Stay up to date with state-of-the-art tools, technologies, and techniques for automation, quality, and security as it applies to continuous integration and deployment practices.


What we are looking for

  • Strong expertise with Linux based operating systems.
  • Experience building high-quality distributed systems or backend service.
  • Experience with designing and administration networking and security in cloud environments.
  • Experience with configuration management and provisioning tools, managing infrastructure through code scripting.
  • You’re a fast learner, can contribute from day one as well as integrate and apply new concepts quickly.
  • You take pride in what you create and passionate about getting the details right, even when no one's looking.
  • You are able to weigh tradeoffs, articulate complex ideas, and have precision about what you know and don't know.
  • You enjoy staying on top of tech trends and hacking new things.


Benefits & Perks

  • Competitive salaries and performance bonuses.
  • Your own Spotify Premium and Netflix accounts.
  • 24-days paid time-off (+ public holidays).
  • Health insurance & pension;


Important

  • Resume/cover letter are optional.
  • The job role is fully remote (anywhere in Egypt).
  • It's long term and comes with an indefinite period employment contract.

Employment Type

Full-time
